Fabio Borini could be headed for Newcastle United or Bordeaux as Milan look to shift his €2.5m salary.

According to Gazzetta dello Sport’s Nicolo Schira, Borini has no place in Marco Giampaolo’s plans for Milan.

The 28-year-old joined the Rossoneri from Sunderland in 2017 and has gone on to play 73 times for the club, with his loan becoming permanent for €5.5m last summer.

Despite being an attacker, he has scored just eight goals in his two seasons at San Siro and was even tried out at full-back by Gennaro Gattuso.

Schira adds Newcastle and Bordeaux are among the first clubs to make enquiries for the Euro 2012 runner-up but warns his €2.5m salary after tax is an ‘obstacle’.

Newcastle are in the market for firepower after losing Ayoze Perez to Leicester City, while Bordeaux recently returned Yann Karamoh to Inter.

BREAKING NEWS

Youri Tielemans is on a flight from Brussels bound for Birmingham with Leicester City and Monaco close to agreeing a club-record fee for the Belgian international, Sky Sports News understands.

We expect the final fee to be around £40m.

Tielemans spent the second half of last season on loan at King Power stadium, scoring three goals and adding four assists in just 13 Premier League games.

His performances alerted a number of other top clubs in the Premier League and Europe, but Leicester have worked hard to secure his signature after Brendan Rodgers made him his number one transfer target.

We told you earlier this week that Tielemans had made it clear to his agent that Leicester was his preferred destination, even though it was suggested Manchester United might come in for him if Paul Pogba leaves Old Trafford this summer.

Anderlecht have completed the signing of Samir Nasri on a free transfer.

BREAKING NEWS

Sky sources understand Maxi Gomez’s preferred destination is now West Ham.

For the Hammers to seal the transfer, they must meet the £45m release clause. Personal terms are not expected to be a problem.

Valencia had reached an agreement which involved three players, including former Celta Vigo forward Santi Mina, plus cash in exchange for Gomez.

The value of Valencia’s deal amounted to the £45m release clause. We understand that the deal went as far as the three players arriving at Celta Vigo for their medicals – only for those medicals to be halted.

Official statement

Regarding FC Barcelona president Josep María Bartomeu's statements on our player Antoine Griezmann.

https://en.atleticodemadrid.com/noticias/official-statement-2

replies.msg:
On May 14, Antoine Griezmann informed Miguel Ángel Gil, Diego Pablo Simeone and Andrea Berta of his decision to leave our club at the end of the season. In the days that followed that meeting, Atlético de Madrid learned that FC Barcelona and the player had reached an agreement in March, specifically in the days following the return match of our Champions League tie against Juventus, and that they had been negotiating the terms of the agreement since mid-February.

Regarding president Bartomeu's statement today we wish to state that it is true that yesterday there was a meeting between Miguel Ángel Gil and FC Barcelona CEO Oscar Grau, at Barcelona's request and that at that meeting, Mr Grau expressed his intention, once the release clause of Antoine Griezmann's contract had decreased from 200 to 120 million euros, to ask for a deferred payment of the aforementioned amount of the clause in force as from July 1.

Atlético de Madrid’s response was obviously negative, as we believe that FC Barcelona and the player have disrespected Atlético de Madrid and all its fans.

quote.msg:
Official statement

Regarding FC Barcelona president Josep María Bartomeu's statements on our player Antoine Griezmann.

https://en.atleticodemadrid.com/noticias/official-statement-2

On May 14, Antoine Griezmann informed Miguel Ángel Gil, Diego Pablo Simeone and Andrea Berta of his decision to leave our club at the end of the season. In the days that followed that meeting, Atlético de Madrid learned that FC Barcelona and the player had reached an agreement in March, specifically in the days following the return match of our Champions League tie against Juventus, and that they had been negotiating the terms of the agreement since mid-February.

Regarding president Bartomeu's statement today we wish to state that it is true that yesterday there was a meeting between Miguel Ángel Gil and FC Barcelona CEO Oscar Grau, at Barcelona's request and that at that meeting, Mr Grau expressed his intention, once the release clause of Antoine Griezmann's contract had decreased from 200 to 120 million euros, to ask for a deferred payment of the aforementioned amount of the clause in force as from July 1.

Atlético de Madrid’s response was obviously negative, as we believe that FC Barcelona and the player have disrespected Atlético de Madrid and all its fans.

replies.msg:
As a consequence, today, Atletico de Madrid has instructed the player, his sister and agent and his lawyer, that Antoine Griezmann, in compliance with his contractual obligations with our club, must appear next Sunday in the club’s facilities in order to start the pre-season with the rest of his teammates.

Through this statement, Atletico de Madrid wishes to express its strongest disapproval of the behaviour of both, especially FC Barcelona, for prompting the player to break his contractual relationship with Atletico de Madrid at a time of the season when the club was involved in the Champions League tie against Juventus, as well as the league title race against FC Barcelona, something that we believe violates the protected periods of negotiation with players and alters the basic rules of integrity in any sporting competition, as well as causing enormous damage to our club and its millions of fans.

Official statement

Regarding FC Barcelona president Josep María Bartomeu's statements on our player Antoine Griezmann.

https://en.atleticodemadrid.com/noticias/official-statement-2

On May 14, Antoine Griezmann informed Miguel Ángel Gil, Diego Pablo Simeone and Andrea Berta of his decision to leave our club at the end of the season. In the days that followed that meeting, Atlético de Madrid learned that FC Barcelona and the player had reached an agreement in March, specifically in the days following the return match of our Champions League tie against Juventus, and that they had been negotiating the terms of the agreement since mid-February.

Regarding president Bartomeu's statement today we wish to state that it is true that yesterday there was a meeting between Miguel Ángel Gil and FC Barcelona CEO Oscar Grau, at Barcelona's request and that at that meeting, Mr Grau expressed his intention, once the release clause of Antoine Griezmann's contract had decreased from 200 to 120 million euros, to ask for a deferred payment of the aforementioned amount of the clause in force as from July 1.

Atlético de Madrid’s response was obviously negative, as we believe that FC Barcelona and the player have disrespected Atlético de Madrid and all its fans.

As a consequence, today, Atletico de Madrid has instructed the player, his sister and agent and his lawyer, that Antoine Griezmann, in compliance with his contractual obligations with our club, must appear next Sunday in the club’s facilities in order to start the pre-season with the rest of his teammates.

Through this statement, Atletico de Madrid wishes to express its strongest disapproval of the behaviour of both, especially FC Barcelona, for prompting the player to break his contractual relationship with Atletico de Madrid at a time of the season when the club was involved in the Champions League tie against Juventus, as well as the league title race against FC Barcelona, something that we believe violates the protected periods of negotiation with players and alters the basic rules of integrity in any sporting competition, as well as causing enormous damage to our club and its millions of fans.

Celtic star Callum McGregor is ready to leave his current side to reunite with Brendan Rodgers at Leicester City, according to Football Insider.

The report suggests that the 26-year-old is keen on a move to the King Power Stadium, with the Foxes ready to start the bidding for the Scot at £15 million.

Leicester boss Rodgers is keen on bringing McGregor to the club ahead of the new season, however, after spending big money on Youri Tielemans and Ayoze Perez, a potential move could be dependent on Harry Maguire’s possible move to Manchester United.
McGregor flourished under the Northern Irishman during a three-year relationship at Celtic Park, becoming one of the best performers in the Scottish Premiership.

The versatile midfielder has turned out 224 times for his boyhood club since turning professional in 2013, and McGregor may not be adding many more appearances to that tally if Leicester firm up their interest in the coming weeks.

鹿島今天(12日)宣佈與巴塞隆拿就安部裕葵轉會一事達成協議，安部在下星期會到西班牙進行體測，如無意外就會正式簽約加盟球隊。安部首先會隸屬於巴塞隆拿B隊，與久保建英一樣在西乙B聯賽(第三級別)比賽。
　　
安部透過鹿島官網發表感言：
　
「從高校畢業以來，在鹿島過了兩年半，不論作為足球員，還是作為一個人，都得到很大的成長。與隊友、教練團、職員還有支持者的每一位，與"Antlers Family"一起為了勝利而戰鬥的日子，是我的驕傲，也是我的財產。
　
這次在賽季途中離隊，是很困難的決定，但因為很渴望在巴塞隆拿展開新挑戰，最後還是決定轉會。今後即使會面對很多困難和障礙，但我相信如果要成長，這些都是我絕對必要經歷的事。在鹿島這樣的球隊累積到的經驗，對我將來的成長會很有用。今後我也會珍惜每一天、每一個瞬間好好踢足球，真的很感謝大家。」
　
在鹿島發表了安部離隊的消息後，安部在鹿島的Club House接受訪問，他說巴塞隆拿是世上無人不知的大球會，所以最初知道他們對自己有興趣時感到很驚訝。安部說20歲在世界球壇來說其實也沒有很年輕，他認為自己應該要帶著焦慮感去比賽。加盟巴塞隆拿後，安部說一切的可能性由他自己去創造，也沒有東西可以失去，他只是希望好好去學習足球這項運動的本質，所以會不顧一切拼命地去做。
　
另外，安部也提到自己雖然是攻擊球員，但巴塞隆拿方面認為他還有其他可能性，有潛質像Jordi Alba、Daniel Alves一樣成為經常上前助攻的SB，安部認為如果真的轉換位置對他問題不大，並笑言自己也很期待作這個嘗試。
　
現年20歲的安部裕葵2017年在廣島瀨戶內高校畢業後加入鹿島，在新人球季已經為球隊上陣13場，射入1球。去年安部的表現更加活躍，J1上陣22場射入2球，獲得2018年「J League Best Young Player」獎項，另外也協助球隊首次稱霸亞洲贏得ACL冠軍，並在年底的世界冠軍球會盃對墨西哥球隊Guadalajara射入一球，也曾以正選身分迎戰皇家馬德里(準決賽)和河床(季軍戰)。今年穿上鹿島的10號球衣，證明球隊對安部的重視及期望，暫時上陣14場射入1球。代表隊方面，安部本來是今年U-20梯隊的骨幹成員，但因為被提拔上A代表缺席了今年的世青，最後安部在美洲國家盃三場比賽均有份上陣。
　
安部裕葵的成長也算是一個異數。在初中時寂寂無聞，因為希望受到球探賞識，於是離開出身地東京都，離開父母獨自一人升讀廣島縣的高校(其中一個原因是他考慮到在他高校三年級那一屆的Inter-high在廣島縣舉行)；本來如果沒有職業球隊招攬，安部打算升讀早稻田大學，但是鹿島球探椎本邦一就在安部高三那年的Inter-high發現了安部裕葵的潛質，後來因為原本鹿島心儀的球員(傳聞是岩崎悠人)沒有答應加入鹿島，所以才向安部招手；加入J League後，安部也是超出預期地適應職業足球，可以說安部的足球生涯，靠努力、實力之餘，又有點運氣地來到今天的位置。
　
「兩年半前根本沒法想像今天的情況，在鹿島這個環境下使我成長。以這樣的成長速度，能夠轉投海外球隊，真的很感謝鹿島。單憑我一個人，是不可能取得前往巴塞隆拿的入場券，幸運的我加入了鹿島，全賴大家使我得到這次機會，我是沒有"不去"的這個選項。」
　
加油啊~安部，期待你再一次創出奇蹟。

(圖片：J League)

基斯文的律師代表，在西甲總部呈交了由巴塞隆拿支付的一億二千萬歐元，單方面終止球員與馬德里體育會的合約。

馬德里體育會認為，金額不足以滿足其違約條款。因為基斯文在五月十四日宣布離開球隊，當時球員顯然已和巴塞隆拿達成協議，而球員此時的違約金尚未由二億歐元降至一億二千萬歐元。

馬德里體育會已考慮採取司法行動，適當地捍衛自己的權利和利益。

https://www.atleticodemadrid.com/noticias/comunicado-oficial-7

Official statement regarding the unilateral termination of the contract that links Antoine Griezmann with our club

Antoine Griezmann, represented by his lawyer, has appeared at the headquarters of the Professional Football League to unilaterally terminate the contract that links the player with Atlético de Madrid, with Fútbol Club Barcelona having deposited the sum of 120 million euros in the name and on behalf of the footballer.

Atlético de Madrid considers that the deposited amount is insufficient to cover his buyout clause, since it is obvious that the agreement between the player and FC Barcelona was closed before the clause was reduced from EUR 200 million to EUR 120 million. It was also prior to the date on which the clause was modified the communication that the player made on 14 May announcing his disassociation from the club.

Atlético de Madrid believes that the termination of the contract happened before the end of the last season due to facts, acts and demonstrations made by the player, and therefore has already initiated the procedures it has deemed appropriate to protect their rights and lawful interests.

http://en.atleticodemadrid.com/noticias/official-statement-4

Coutinho agent: "Liverpool lies very, very deep in his heart. He was a big fan of them throughout the campaign. He was wishing for them to win the title and he has a very strong affinity there so I think it will be very difficult for him to go to a direct competitor of Liverpool"

Kia Joorabchian (one of Coutinho's representatives): "As I said to you last time, Pep Segura told me that Coutinho was not available for a Barcelona departure. Josep Bartomeu told me the same thing last week in Barcelona." [rmc via @GFFN]

Joorabchian: "With this discourse in mind, we decided not to look at the market for our player, out of respect for the decision made by Barcelona to keep him. We have therefore not looked at what other clubs are offering."

Joorabchian: "But I have since learnt, and it is a fact, that André Curry (Barça’s South America representative), is saying something completely different. He is pushing for Coutinho to be included in a transfer that would see Neymar move from PSG."

Joorabchian: "As I have said to you, Coutinho does not have any offers from any club because he respected Barça's decision. But they are not respecting what they told us. I remained silent in this period, but it can no longer be that they are allowed to lie about their player."

Joorabchian: "Barcelona have to tell the truth! And if they want Coutinho to go, they need to say so. And with the player, we will then decide what is best for his future."
